input: Three-tier system of Panchayati Raj consists of

options.A: Gram Panchayat, Panchayat Samiti, Block Samiti
options.B: Gram Panchayat, Block Samiti, Zila Parishad
options.C: Gram Panchayat, Panchayat Samiti, Zila Parishad
options.D: Gram Panchayat, Zila Parishad, Block Samiti

explanation: Panchayati Raj is a system of governance in which are the basic unit of administrations . It has 3 levels: Gram panchayat (village level), Mandal Parishad or block samiti or panchayat samiti (block level) and Zila parishad (district level).
